name: ScaleMan
description:
Change the size of the body in this game.

Breakthrough the stage!
Only handle the slider to resize the body.
There are many obstracts.
It may be a car, fense, tiny bridge, or stacked blocks.
to run through to the goal!

Ready for a fun running?

Features:
- Easy, one-finger swipe to handle.
- You can compete with enemy every five stage.
- Many gimmick appears.
